front.title: Definitions of Managed Objects for VRRPv3

abstract.t: This specification defines a Management Information Base (MIB) for use with SNMP-based network management. In particular, it defines objects for configuring, monitoring, and controlling routers that employ the Virtual Router Redundancy Protocol Version 3 for both IPv4 and IPv6 as defined in RFC 5798. This memo obsoletes RFC 2787.
